text: mariyu atanu tana tallidandrulanu sinhasanam mida kurcobettukunnadu. Mariyu varandaru atani mundu sastangapaddaru. Mariyu (yusuph) annadu: "O na tandri! Nenu purvam kanna kala yokka bhavam ide kada! Na prabhuvu vastavanga danini satyam cesi cupadu. Mariyu vastavanga nannu cerasana nundi bayatiki tisi kuda naku ento melu cesadu; naku mariyu na sodarula madhya saitanu virodham kaligincina taruvata (ippudu) mim'malni edari nundi (ikkadaku) teccadu. Niscayanga, na prabhuvu suksmagrahi tanu korinadi yuktito neravercutadu. Niscayanga ayana sarvajnudu, maha vivekavantudu
